title: Cooking at College With a Microwave
description: If your dorm allows a microwave, Sam the Cooking Guy has three quick meals you can make that won't taste like dorm food at all.

asset.title: Cooking at College With a Microwave
asset.description: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/btsHome.asp? If your dorm as a microwave, Sam the Cooking Guy has three quick meals you can make that won't taste like ...
asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond

transcripts: Hey it's Sam. In our last video we showed you what you can make at college is you had nothing to cook on. Now we're gonna show you what you can make using just a microwave. For starters, how about a breakfast bagel. Just beat an egg in a small greased custard cup and microwave it along with some microwaved bacon for about 45 seconds. Then, put the egg on a bagel top with cheese, the bacon, and booyah.  A great start to the day in about a minute. Or how about poking some holes in a potato and microwaving it 3-4 minutes aside then open it up, add some microwave chili, a little sour cream, and some cheese-- beautiful. And while we probably all agree that the microwave is ideal for pop corn, it doesn't have to be served the same way all the time. So how about making a butter and salted maple version or buffalo sauce and honey, or even mixed herb & Parmesan.  It's all simple, quick, and delicious and you can do all this stuff you just have to want to.
